short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pay gas in any token from any chain

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GasPay is the core offering is a game-changer for anyone who has struggled with the headache-inducing gas fees that come with transacting on the blockchain. With GasPay, users can now pay their gas fees in any token, from any chain, making their web3 experience as smooth as possible.

Installing GasPay is a breeze. All you have to do is download the extension, and the rest is taken care of. While transacting, simply choose your preferred token as gas and pay your fees in any token you like. With GasPay, there's no need to worry about the confusing and ever-changing gas fees associated with blockchain transactions.
